Summary of changes:
- Added ThemeContext with localStorage persistence and system preference detection
- Created ThemeToggle component with Sun/Moon icons
- Enabled Tailwind CSS dark mode with 'class' strategy
- Added CSS variables for dark mode colors
- Updated Navigation component with dark mode styles and ThemeToggle
- Updated Footer with dark:bg-gray-900 and dark text colors
- Updated ProductCard with dark mode hover and background styles
- Updated About component with dark mode backgrounds and text
- Created 7 E2E tests for dark mode functionality

Key features:
- Theme persists in localStorage
- Respects system preference on first load
- Smooth transitions between themes
- All major components support dark mode
- Comprehensive test coverage
